code: const meals=[{name:"Vegetable Stir Fry",description:"A quick and easy stir fry with a mix of your favorite vegetables, served over rice or noodles."},{name:"Chickpea Salad",description:"A refreshing salad made with chickpeas, cucumbers, tomatoes, and a lemon vinaigrette."},{name:"Pasta Primavera",description:"Pasta tossed with seasonal vegetables and a light olive oil sauce."},{name:"Vegetable Curry",description:"A hearty curry made with assorted vegetables and served with rice or naan."},{name:"Stuffed Bell Peppers",description:"Bell peppers stuffed with a mixture of quinoa, black beans, corn, and spices."},{name:"Mushroom Risotto",description:"Creamy risotto cooked with mushrooms and finished with parmesan cheese."},{name:"Caprese Salad",description:"A simple salad made with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze."},{name:"Zucchini Noodles",description:"Spiralized zucchini tossed with marinara sauce and topped with parmesan cheese."},{name:"Lentil Soup",description:"A warm and comforting soup made with lentils, carrots, and celery."},{name:"Quinoa Bowl",description:"A nutritious bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and a tahini dressing."}];export default meals;
